localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Vmaker is an all-in-one video messaging tool encompassing a screen/webcam recorder, a player, and an in-built video editor. ğŸ“¹ Vmaker provides the best-in-class Video Management System that gives a seamless experience with asset management. ğŸ“‚
nodes.title: Vmaker for Chrome - Asynchronous video messaging made easy
nodes.author: Srinivasa Raghavan

nodes.excerpt: Lack of communication channels on websites results in customer churn, low satisfaction rate and minimal to zero customer success. LiveCaller solves those issues by offering all in one solution, that combines Web Call, Web Chat, Callback, Social Messaging Apps
nodes.title: LiveCaller - Free web call with online chat, omni channel and co-browsing
nodes.author: Tanjum ğŸ”¥

nodes.excerpt: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.
nodes.title: Hyper Online - Animoji social network for people into games and anime.
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Better collaboration for product teams in multiple time zones. Exchange video, voice, and screen recordings with your team at the tap of a button.
nodes.title: PingPong - Video messaging for remote teams
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: WebiCaster is a new professional network for English and Spanish podcasters, it's the easiest way to discover amazing people who want to be part of your podcast. We make it easy for you to find a guest for your interviews or a co-host to create a new podcast.
nodes.title: WebiCaster - Free Professional network for podcasters
nodes.author: Robert Menetray

nodes.excerpt: I realized we don't have a lot of tools for a conversation-first culture. So, I deleted social media off of my phone and built this app. Whenever I am craving connection, I have it populate a random contact for me to text or call.
nodes.title: Out of the Blue - A roulette for your contacts
nodes.author: Brett Bejcek

nodes.excerpt: Weet is a video messaging tool that allows you to have asynchronous conversations with your team, partners, and customers. Weet includes instant recording, screen sharing, virtual background, video filters, emoji reactions, and rich comment options.
nodes.title: Weet - Asynchronous video communication for remote teams
nodes.author: Matthew Howells-Barby

nodes.excerpt: Verbz is a voice productivity app for teams. Create notes, assign tasks, make announcements, run stand-ups, or just chat. Talk or type, listen or read.
nodes.title: Verbz - Create tasks, notes, and chat, all with voice
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Doppler Share is an easy way to share one-off secrets in a simple end-to-end encrypted way where the links auto-expire after a certain number of views and days.
nodes.title: Doppler Share - Share one-off secrets with end-to-end encryption ğŸ¤«
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Postmodern is a mobile app designed for ephemeral, one-on-one, anonymous conversations. Whether we seek to explore our own minds, or the structures of our society, we need communication tools that allow us to peel away the pollutants to our thought.
nodes.title: Postmodern. - Short, anonymous conversations with strangers.
nodes.author: Nathaniel

nodes.excerpt: Quill is the best way to message with a team or group. Built for productivity and focus, Quill reduces notifications, collects conversations into threads, and gets out of your way â€” so you can get back to doing what you do best.
nodes.title: Quill - Messaging to make your team better
nodes.author: Jordan Borth

nodes.excerpt: Making remote work feel less remote through informal conversations and serendipity.
nodes.title: Agave - Remote work that feels less remote
nodes.author: Jared T

nodes.excerpt: With WhatsApp Actions, it is now possible to send messages to your contacts on WhatsApp right from your Hubspot workflows.
nodes.title: WhatsApp Actions for HubSpot - Send WhatsApp messages from HubSpot workflows

nodes.excerpt: Wildcast is a patent-pending networking platform for those in the podcast industry to connect and podcast together! You can build a profile as a podcast or guest, browse others to connect with, add them to your network, and start collaborating.
nodes.title: Wildcast - Patent-pending podcast networking platform
nodes.author: Madison Catania

nodes.excerpt: You know, you really shouldn't have to settle for emojis that only kind-of express how you feel. Punctuate your deepest sentiments and pull off those more-subtle remarks with this Very Necessary (and expanding) iMessage sticker pack.
nodes.title: Very Necessary Emojis - For very sarcastic people
nodes.author: Aviv Stein

nodes.excerpt: We have built a tool for developers and businesses in Africa to engage thier customers via different messaging channels like SMS,Voice,Email,Whatsapp We currently have built APIs for devs to integrate and working on no-code tools for business owners.
nodes.title: Sendchamp - Multi-channel messaging tool for devs & businesses in Africa
nodes.author: GOODNESS  KAYODE

nodes.excerpt: Record your screen and webcam. No installation required. Protected by end-to-end encryption. Free to use on Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android.
nodes.title: CALIPIO Screen Recorder - Free and secure screen recorder
nodes.author: Daniel Modler

nodes.excerpt: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
nodes.title: Planmesh - The easiest way to plan with friends

nodes.excerpt: "The quality of our relationships determines the quality of our lives." -Esther Perel Call Your Friends helps you develop the habits and skills to build closer connections with friends and family through simple text reminders.
nodes.title: Call Your Friends - Dramatically raise the quality of your friendships.

nodes.excerpt: Beeper is fast. A single app to chat on iMessage, WhatsApp, and 13 other networks. You can search, snooze, or archive messages. And with a unified inbox, youâ€™ll never miss a message again.
nodes.title: Beeper - All of your chats in one app

nodes.excerpt: Business chat tools don't cover messaging apps WhatsApp or Telegram conversations. NovoChat makes it easy for businesses to communicate with customers across any messaging app.
nodes.title: NovoChat - Chat on WhatsApp, Telegram, LINE & more in 1 single place
